body_html:
I tried installing the newest Tensorflow (1.11.0-rc1) with the newest Python (3.7.0), newest CUDA (9.2) and the newest cuDNN (7.2). It failed miserably.

Now with CUDA 10.0 and cuDNN 7.3 it will be an even bigger mess. A compatibility table would help very much!

body:
I tried installing the newest Tensorflow (1.11.0-rc1) with the newest Python (3.7.0), newest CUDA (9.2) and the newest cuDNN (7.2). It failed miserably.

Now with CUDA 10.0 and cuDNN 7.3 it will be an even bigger mess. A compatibility table would help very much!
